patthana4.3:5.1: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:5.2: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:5.3: Kusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo sappaccayo ca abyākato sappaccayo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana4.3:6.1: Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:13.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
patthana4.3:16.1: Akusalaṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. #1
patthana4.3:17.1: Abyākataṃ sappaccayaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana4.3:18.1: Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, naāhāre … pe … namagge ekaṃ … pe … navippayutte tīṇi … pe … novigate pañca.
patthana4.3:23.1: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:24.1: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.

patthana4.3:26.1: Kusalo sappaccayo dhammo kusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:27.1: Akusalo sappaccayo dhammo akusalassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:28.1: Abyākato sappaccayo dhammo abyākatassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
patthana4.3:29.1: Hetuyā satta, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā dasa, anantare satta … pe … sahajāte nava, aññamaññe tīṇi, nissaye terasa, upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte āsevane tīṇi, kamme satta, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre … pe … magge satta, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte pañca … pe … avigate terasa.
